content: the hungry caterpillar designed by jillian plante materials 1 skein berroco comfort color 9750 red 1 skein berroco comfort color 9839 green green & yellow felt- for eyes polyfill needles & gauge gauge is un-important use needles 2 sizes smaller than required for yarn so that stuffing doesn t show through i used size 5 needles with the berroco comfort head - using red yarn cast on - 6 stitches join in the round row 1 knit all odd row will be knit row 2- * kfb into all stitches 12 stitches row 4- * kfb k1 18 stitches row 6 - *kfb k2 * 24 stitches row 8 - *kfb k3 * 30 stitches row 10 - *kfb k4 * 36 stitches row 12- * kfb k5 * 42 stitches row 13- 19 knit all stitches 42 stitches row 20 * k2tog k5* 36 stitches row 22 - * k2tog k4* 30 stitches row 24 - * k2tog k3* 24 stitches row 26- * k2tog k2* 18 stitches row 28 - * k2tog k1* 12 stitches row 30- * k2tog* 6 stitches cut yarn leaving a tail draw tail through remaining stitches and pull and secure body using green to create the chubby less defined caterpillar cast on - 6 stitches join in the round row 1 knit all odd row will be knit row 81- 83 knit all stitches 30 stitches row 2- * kfb into all stitches 12 stitches row 84 - *kfb k4 * 36 stitches row 4- * kfb k1 18 stitches row 86 * kfb k5 * 42 stitches row 6 - *kfb k2 * 24 stitches row 87-93 - knit all stitches 42 stitches row 8 - *kfb k3 * 30 stitches row 94 * k2tog k5* 36 stitches row 10 - *kfb k4 * 36 stitches row 96- * k2tog k4* 30 stitches row 12- * kfb k5 * 42 stitches row 98 - * k2tog k3* 24 stitches row 13- 19 knit all stitches 42 stitches row 100- * k2tog k2* 18 stitches row 20 * k2tog k5* 36 stitches row 102 - * k2tog k1* 12 stitches row 22 - * k2tog k4* 30 stitches row 104- * k2tog* 6 stitches row 23-25 - knit all stitches 30 stitches cut yarn leaving a tail draw tail through remaining stitches and pull and secure row 26 - *kfb k4 * 36 stitches row 28 * kfb k5 * 42 stitches antennae using green row 29- 35 knit all stitches 42 stitches cast on 6 stitches and i-cord row 46 * k2tog k5* 36 stitches continue i-cording for two inches cast off use cast row 48- * k2tog k4* 30 stitches off tail to secure end curled into antennae row 49-51 - knit all stitches 30 stitches row 52 - *kfb k4 * 36 stitches eyes & nose using felt row 54 * kfb k5 * 42 stitches cut out two larger yellow ovals and two smaller ovals and stitch one of
